author: emeliasarfo2
title: Grow NGOs, Grow Cardano
description: How can NGOs in Africa receive funding from Cardano for income generating development projects to transform more lives?
importance: NGOs in Africa can promote Cardano to be adopted by many. More will be engaged in Cardano and Cardano's mission will be a reality.
success:
1. More Africans engaged in Cardano, adopted by governments
2. Cardano becomes the best crypto
3. More projects physically changing lives
